content:
Google Sheets is a fantastic tool for creating a digital catalog. I'd be happy to provide you with some template suggestions for each of your collection types. Feel free to modify them as needed to fit your specific needs.

**Vinyl Records Template**

| Column A: Record ID | Column B: Artist | Column C: Album Title | Column D: Release Date | Column E: Genre | Column F: Condition | Column G: Purchase Date | Column H: Purchase Price | Column I: Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |

**Vintage Cameras Template**

| Column A: Camera ID | Column B: Camera Model | Column C: Manufacturer | Column D: Year Produced | Column E: Lens Type | Column F: Condition | Column G: Purchase Date | Column H: Purchase Price | Column I: Serial Number | Column J: Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |

**Stamps Template**

| Column A: Stamp ID | Column B: Country | Column C: Issue Date | Column D: Denomination | Column E: Condition | Column F: Mint/Used | Column G: Purchase Date | Column H: Purchase Price | Column I: Catalog Number | Column J: Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |

**Funko POP! Figures Template**

| Column A: POP! ID | Column B: Character | Column C: Franchise | Column D: Release Date | Column E: Condition | Column F: Purchase Date | Column G: Purchase Price | Column H: Exclusive/Variant | Column I: Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |

**Sports Memorabilia Template**

| Column A: Item ID | Column B: Athlete/Team | Column C: Sport | Column D: Item Type (e.g., jersey, ball, photo) | Column E: Condition | Column F: Authenticity | Column G: Purchase Date | Column H: Purchase Price | Column I: Certificate of Authenticity | Column J: Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |

**Tips for using these templates:**

* You can add or remove columns as needed to fit your specific collection.
* Consider adding an "Image" column to upload photos of each item.
* Use the "Notes" column to add any additional information that doesn't fit into the other columns.
* You can sort and filter your data using Google Sheets' built-in features to easily organize and search your collection.
* If you have a large collection, you might want to consider creating separate sheets within the same Google Sheets document for different sub-collections (e.g., separate sheets for different sports teams or franchises).

Feel free to modify these templates to fit your needs, and happy cataloging!
